text:
Hong Kong: Hotel Launches Godiva Chocalate Afternoon Tea Set Menu 
Foodie Friday 
Ritz-Carton, Hong Kong, takes high tea to new heights with a decadant afternoon tea set that is mostly - but not exclusively - about Godiva Chocolate, and it's served on the 103rd floor with stunning harbour views . Afternoon Tea Set at Cafe 103. Photo Credit: Ritz-Carlton, Hong Kong. 

The Ritz-Carlton, Hong Kong, has launched an afternoon tea set menu that will be served at Cafe 103 through 1 January. 
Hotels across Hong Kong have been launching afternoon tea sets one after another. It seems to be a trend, with chefs at each hotel trying their best to outdo each other. 
The Ritz-Carlton, Hong Kong, is latest to enter the fray. What sets this afternoon tea set apart from the afternoon teas being served at other Hong Kong hotels is that it is MOSTLY about chocolate. 
Make that Godiva Chocolate, to be precise. But not exclusively. There are a couple of sweets without chocolate as well as some mouth-watering sandwiches. 
What is interesting - and it has been frequently commented upon by food critics - is the absence of chocolate at most of the afternoon tea sets being served at other hotels. 
Are the chefs at the Ritz-Carlton on to something? 
Cafe 103 Cafe 103 at the Ritz-Carlton, Hong Kong, a 5 star hotel in Kowloon. Photo Credit: Rtiz-Carlton, Hong Kong. 
Launched on 1 October 2015, the Godiva Sablés Fine Butter Biscuits Afternoon Tea will be served at Café 103 on the hotel's 103rd floor through 1 January 2016. 
The hotel's Chef Chocolatier Jean Apostolou was inspired to create 5 Sablés butter biscuits by his travels across 5 continents. Each one of the biscuits on the menu is reminiscent of one of the continents he has visited. 
But Chef Jean didn't come up with the menu single-handedly. 
Executive Chef Peter Find, Executive Pastry Chef Richard Long, and Godiva’s Chef Chocolatier, Pacific Rim and China, Philippe Daue, collaborated with Chef Jean in creating the set menu, which also includes some mouth-watering sandwiches. 
And if that brief description doesn't your taste buds flowing, maybe these photos will! 

Godiva Sablés Fine Butter Biscuits Afternoon Tea Photo Credit: Rtiz-Carlton, Hong Kong. Photo Credit: Rtiz-Carlton, Hong Kong. Photo Credit: Rtiz-Carlton, Hong Kong. Photo Credit: Rtiz-Carlton, Hong Kong. Photo Credit: Rtiz-Carlton, Hong Kong. 

I am the first to admit that I don't have much of a sweet tooth, but I DO love chocolate, and this afternoon tea set looks very intriguing. 
In addition to the signature chocolate afternoon tea, Cafe 103 serves lunch and dinner buffets. It is one of 6 food and beverage outlets at the hotel. Other outlets include ... Ozone , the world's highest bar; Tin Lung Heen , a fine dining restaurant serving Cantonese cuisine; Tosca , featuring an innovative Italian menu prepared in an in an open kitchen; The Lounge and Bar , an all-day dining venue serving afternoon tea accompanied by jazz; and Almas Caviar Bar, Caviar House, and Prunier , which serves Prunier caviar, Balik smoked salmon, and champagne before or after dinner. 
Where 
Cafe 103, 103rd Floor, The Ritz-Carlton, Hong Kong, International Commerce Centre, 1 Austin Road West, Kowloon, Hong Kong. Telephone: (8852) 2263-2263. Website: Ritz-Carlton, Hong Kong .
